about_the_game:
Radiant Bricks is a classic Brick Breaker Style game with a twist. You can change the color of the paddles, hitting the ball with the paddle will change the color of the ball. You can only destroy bricks that are the same color as the ball.

You also have a paddle on both sides of the bricks. Some strategy will help you create

Current Features:

    * Select a primary and secondary color to make the bricks your preferred colors.
    * Play solo or with a friend locally. Let another player take control of the second paddle.
    * Multiple power ups that do things like increase the score, give you a bigger paddle or even add an extra wall!
    * Pixel Art Style Graphics

Planned Features

    * Level Creator
    * Local Co-op mode

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Basically any as long as you can run Steam and use Vulkan
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 800 Series or newer, AMD Radeon™ RX 400/500 Series
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

  • OS: Windows 10 or later
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 800 Series or newer, AMD Radeon™ RX 400/500 Series
